borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Conversion of the existing property into 2no. single family dwellinghouses; erection of a rear extension at second floor level over part of the existing back addition, erection of a dormer window to the rear elevation of existing rear roof extension, replacement of existing windows to the side elevation at first floor level (no.21); installation of a window following the removal of an existing door, installation of obscure glazed window panel to replace existing glazed window panel to the side elevation, formation of a Juliette balcony to the rear elevation at first floor level following partial demolition of existing ground floor rear extension and balcony above (no.19); installation of rooflight on top of the main flat roof at roof level, installation of 2no. rooflights following the removal of existing rooflights in the front roofslope, erection of single storey rear extension to the side and rear of existing back addition following demolition of external rear structures, and excavation of the front and part of the rear garden to form lightwells with galvanised metal grill to the front and walk on glass to the rear in connection with the creation of new basement level, and associated alterations and landscaping works to both properties (nos.19 and 21).
